text: Thermodesulfobium is a Gram-negative, strictly anaerobic, moderately thermophilic, non-spore-forming and non-motile genus of bacteria from the family of Thermodesulfobiaceae. ==References== == Further reading == * * * * Category:Thermoanaerobacterales Category:Bacteria genera Category:Thermophiles Category:Anaerobes
title: Thermodesulfobium
